sentences.sentence: The flame of my rage will incinerate you.
sentences.translation: 我内心气愤的火焰将把你熔为灰烬。

sentences.sentence: The flames of my rage will incinerate you!
sentences.translation: 狂暴的火焰将把你熔为灰烬！

sentences.sentence: If your craft is powered by solid or liquid fuel, chances are it will ignite and incinerate you.
sentences.translation: 如果你的飞船是固体或液体燃料驱动，它随时可能燃起大火，把你烧成灰烬。
